code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Switch}from'react-router-dom';import Profile from'./components/Profile';import Schedule from'./components/Schedule';import Match from'./components/Match';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[user,setUser]=useState({firstName:'John',lastName:'Doe',availability:[]});const setUserAvailability=newAvailability=>{setUser(prevUser=>({...prevUser,availability:newAvailability}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Switch,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",exact:true,component:Profile}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/schedule",render:props=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Schedule,{...props,user:user,setUserAvailability:setUserAvailability})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/match",component:Match})]})});}export default App;
